name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: dSender - Mass DM bot for Discord™️

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discord mass DM bot! Extract discord group members and send bulk customize message to them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Discord DM Bot to send mass DMs with personalized text and images, videos.

# HOW TO USE

1. Open discord.com and log in to the application.
2. Paste your target User ID list, or load members from your current channel.
3. Edit your DM text message, use placeholder <USERNAME> <NAME> and {phrase 1|phrase 2} spin syntax for customize messages.
4. Click "START" to begin your automated DMs.

UPGRADE

✓ Save task progress, resume task from history
✓ Import User ID from CSV file
✓ Send Image / Video / file attachment
✓ Blacklist in the settings page
✓ Fix exclude selected history history bug
✓ Add captcha verify error handle
✓ More safe, More stable

# FEATURES

✓ Send bulk messages to Discord users.
✓ Load members from your current channel.
✓ Personalized messages with placeholders and spinx syntax template.
✓ Message Template
✓ Automatically save sending the result to history, download sending list.

# NOTICE

Kindly do not use it for SPAMMING which is Discord™ strictly prohibited.

# FAQ

https://discord-dm-bot.extensionsfox.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.

# DATA PRIVACY

All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you sent.
